#summary Entrelacs Arrow Space is a persistent storage for "arrows".

=The "Arrow paradigm"=
Entrelacs System deals with "arrows". Please see the ArrowParadigm page to understand the basics.

=The Arrows Space=
The main characteristic of the Entrelacs system is to provide a single matrix to store any form of knowledge as arrows. This storage space is called the "Arrows Space". Please see the ArrowsSpace page for further readings.
